comment._content: a feat of construction, imagination, and drawing.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
In the four years leading up to 1909, financier  Edward H. Harriman built a big house.  Several hundred yards north of the house was a high steel tower from which he hoped to be able to get a forty mile view on every side.

Perhaps this is a drawing for the tower.

Harriman's house was on Cranberry Lake.
